heroDescription: Empower your community to track and encourage Islamic practices. Create groups, set deed templates, and inspire each other on the path of righteousness.
featuresTitle: Features that Empower Your Faith Journey
groupManagementDescription: Create and join groups to track deeds collectively and inspire each other.
customizableDeedTemplatesDescription: Set up templates for daily prayers, dhikr, Quran reading, and more.
pointSystemDescription: Earn points for completed deeds and redeem them within your group.
pushNotificationsDescription: Receive reminders and updates on group activities to stay motivated.
installIosStep1: Open Safari and visit our website
installIosStep2: Tap the share icon at the bottom of the screen
installIosStep3: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
installIosStep4: Tap "Add" in the top right corner
installAndroidStep1: Open Chrome and visit our website
installAndroidStep2: Tap the menu icon (three dots) in the top right
installDesktopStep1: Open Chrome and visit our website
installDesktopStep2: Click the install icon (plus sign) in the address bar
installDesktopStep4: The app will be installed and appear on your desktop
faqQuestion1: How do I create a group in {appName}?
faqAnswer1: To create a group, you need a Basic or Pro plan. Once subscribed, you can create a group by navigating to the "Groups" section and clicking on "Create New Group". You can then set up deed templates and invite members to join your group.
faqQuestion2: What kind of deeds can I track with {appName}?
faqAnswer2: {appName} is designed to track various Islamic practices. You can create templates for daily prayers, dhikr, Quran reading, fasting, charity, and any other good deeds you want to encourage in your community. The flexibility of our system allows you to customize templates according to your group's needs.
faqQuestion3: How does the point system work?
faqQuestion4: How do push notifications work in {appName}?
faqAnswer3: As group members complete their deeds, they earn points based on the rules set by the group admin. These points can be used to track progress, create friendly competition, or even be redeemed for rewards within the group. Group owners and admins can set up a reward system using QR codes for point redemption.
faqAnswer4: Push notifications in {appName} serve two main purposes. First, group owners can send manual reminders to group members. Second, the app automatically sends notifications when someone in the group completes a good deed, encouraging and motivating other members to participate.
ctaTitle: Start Your Journey of Faith Today
ctaDescription: Join thousands of others strengthening their faith and community with {appName}.
limitReached: It looks like you reached the limit of your current plan.
nextNotificationTime: You can send your next notification in {minutes} minutes.
